 2000-02282000-02-240,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY,  TB,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the RADIOCOMMUNICATION REGULATIONS by exempting radios operating in the amateur radio service, whether a fixed or mobile station, from the requirement to obtain a radio licence, effective April 1, 2000.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0078 Publication Date: 2000-03-15
